items.title: Pickling twice breaks it
items.body:
I pickled the object, then tried to copy it. 
This caused it to try to delete the spark attribute again, causing an error to be thrown.
It should only delete it if it is present.

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
KeyError                                  Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-5-9d2ed6ca5909> in <module>()
----> 1 rs_tmp = copy.deepcopy(rs)

~/.virt_env/3/lib/python3.6/copy.py in deepcopy(x, memo, _nil)
    167                     reductor = getattr(x, "__reduce_ex__", None)
    168                     if reductor:
--> 169                         rv = reductor(4)
    170                     else:
    171                         reductor = getattr(x, "__reduce__", None)

~/.virt_env/3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/skspark/spark_base_search_cv.py in __getstate__(self)
    301         """To not try to pickle the non-serializable SparkSession"""
    302         attributes = dict(self.__dict__)
--> 303         del attributes['spark']
    304         return attributes
```
